Class DotInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • DotInfo

  • public class DotInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    The class DotInfo is a simple helper class to store the state (e.g. clicked, mined, number of neighbooring mines...) at the dot position (x,y)
    Since:
    2018/02/24
    Author:
    Guy-Vincent Jourdan, University of Ottawa, Liyuan Cao #300042723, Yi Feng #300042981
